# netbox_user (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a user in Netbox. You can identify the user using `id` or `username`.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "netbox_user" "admin" {
  username = "admin"
}

output "example" {
  value = data.netbox_user.admin.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Unique ID of the user. Use this or `username` to look up the user.
- `username` (String) Username of the user. Use this or `id` to look up the user.

### Read-Only

- `email` (String) Email address of the user.
- `first_name` (String) First name of the user.
- `is_active` (Boolean) Whether the user account is active.
- `is_staff` (Boolean) Whether the user can log into the admin site.
- `last_name` (String) Last name of the user.
